v.v: The king rejoices in your strength, Yahweh!
You have given him his heartâ€™s desire
For you bring him rich blessings;
He asked you for life; you gave it to him;
His glory is great because of your victory;
For you grant him lasting blessings;
For the king trusts in Yahweh;
Your hand will seize all your enemies;
At the time of your anger, you will burn them up as in a fiery furnace.
You will destroy their offspring from the earth
For they intended evil against you;
For you will turn them back;
Be exalted, Yahweh, in your strength;

v: How greatly he rejoices in the salvation you provide!
and have not held back the request of his lips.
you placed on his head a crown of purest gold.
you gave him the length of his days forever and ever.
you have bestowed on him splendor and majesty.
you make him glad with the joy of your presence.
through the covenant faithfulness of the Most High he will not be moved.
your right hand will seize those who hate you.
Yahweh will consume them in his wrath,
and the fire will devour them.
and their descendants from among the human race.
they conceived a plot with which they will not succeed!
you will draw your bow before them.
we will sing and praise your power.
